content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: I think I'm going to take a walk to the hunny store and see my old pal Judith!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 2:
Text: @emjaystar That is cute, well done young lady.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 3:
Text: dunkin donuts (((: i hope @DanceDancexox doesnt die from the old lady and the nun
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 4:
Text: off to kick it old school at Pro Performance. more tweeting as the night unfolds. If i remember . .
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 5:
Text: @CosmicMother Ah Russ!  Listening & Loving it! Wish I could go back to those days, love the oldie films & songs! 2 do - Build Time Machine
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 6:
Text: @JGunds I really, really want to! But I already made plans to see some old friends tonight. I can't believe I'm going to miss out on 3eb
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: @theotherlily  I hope client    Orrr maybe he's an old buddy of Shawn's dad..that need help?
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 8:
Text: http://twitpic.com/6ioe2 - (one week old) 3 months in less than an hour.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 9:
Text: doing boring old science homework  btw ppl if your going to wag class dont go to another class instead (random ppl)
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 10:
Text: Great day at the races so far, except we had a 12 yr old race get transported to the ER.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 11:
Text: No ultimate frisbee.  not enough responses. Let's do Friday evening. Any takers?  Come feel young again and enjoy.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 12:
Text: @elberke12 Lazy Friday? Are those allowed at debtwire?!? Back in the good old days they certainly weren't
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 13:
Text: g'day guys!. its a cyber stab in the back   .got a few old twitter friends very obviously blanking me.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 14:
Text: Just finished AP interview with a young man turning 12 Tues.  He passed.  Waiting for next appt. to show just not sure when he'll come.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 15:
Text: http://twitpic.com/5okvg - old physics where we use to cram every morning.. haha i quite miss it
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 16:
Text: about to sit down and eat a big old bowl of pineapple!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 17:
Text: @Lunie380   @MzKiana it's awesome to see a young married couple with children sold out to Jesus(& enjoying life). Y'all be encouraged
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: @residentartist The younger one liked her celery anyway.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 19:
Text: Recital is over...my body aches all over.  Too old for this...BUT I STILL GOT IT
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 20:
Text: miley's concert is in december i wanna go!  is anyone else secretly a 12 year old girl and wanna come with me? @lil_miss_sneha?  c'mooon
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 21:
Text: Weather z nt changin..itz same old fckin hot weather thn too m sneezing
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 22:
Text: don't you just hate these old drivers on the road that cause accidents...Rubens  #F1
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 23:
Text: @BeautyBlogger Wish my blog qualified.  Not 3 months old yet
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 24:
Text: my knee is sore today  is this what old age feels like haha im falling apart!!
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 25:
Text: looking for old friends,, all i have is names.. and i dont remember faces :S // only found one
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 26:
Text: trying to remember the lyrics of a song with the world cinderella... i know is a old song, light rock, but arghh can't remember
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 27:
Text: so apparently no one is going out friday, so that's a bust, guess I'll go to work instead! Trying to resolve to the life of an old maid
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 28:
Text: im getting jealous of the looks of my old friends in mtl  they look amazing and im just.. -- PFFT .
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 29:
Text: @tellyyy man whatever your just mad cuz you drive like an old lady lol but i love you baby
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 30:
Text: @herathcrush: its a girl. They have 4 girls now  The 2 oldest are teens and the 3rd is 7 yrs old.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Target Example:
Text: I now have a No.2 folding autographic brownie((really old camera)), stil;l can't find my other polariod tho
Annotation from annotator:
